channel.title: Fews bundel uv kweastons!
channel.description:
Here are a few major questions i need help with, I entirely SUCK with servers, so if you could help meh with teh followin
1. How do i make attacking delayed between each hit, so people cant mass and constantly hit
2. How do i make spells require runes.
Thats it for now, answer by quoting and just put the # of the one you answered and the answer next to it. [center][img]http://www.moparisthebest.org/smf/Themes/default/images/warnwarn.gif[/img] Rule 3[/center]

item.title: Fews bundel uv kweastons!
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

Yes but its already created, the if statement asks for the runes, but it still lets you do it without them.

I need to know how to change the existing ice burst to require runes.

Read full topic
